title: SVP of Software Engineering @ Trilogy
body:
Leading independent department of 30-40 people (engineering, design, product, operations) with full autonomy over $6M/year budget, team structure, and processes. Expanded from backend engineering team to full product organization including non-engineering functions.

Shipped multiple greenfield products from concept to production as hands-on product manager, architect, and full-stack engineer. Notable launches: TimeBack (AI tutoring platform for Alpha School enabling 99th percentile learning outcomes) and enhanced Trilogy Sales Platform (managing thousands of automated contract renewals across 200+ products). Balance strategic leadership with technical execution while directly managing all reports.
